description: This document contains important configuration information for nodes used in the GNS3 Simulator

ID.description: ID or Name of the node, for human use only

IP.description: IP address of the node. This will be used to configure the nodes and must be accurate.

SUBNET_MASK.description: Network mask of the node. This will be used to configure the nodes and must be accurate.

items.description: List of component TAGS for the simulator

METHOD.description: Method or emulated logic to perform
